stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de dag ni khyod kyis sbyin par bya ba ma yin gyi/ de dag ni gzhan zhig gis sbyin dgos so/ /de bzhin du ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bla drang srong sbyin dang gna' mi dang brgya

byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams dang / rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pas kyang gser dngul khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song na de dag la yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag ni khyed kyis kyang sbyin par

bya ba ma yin no zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas re shig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas/ gser gyi gzhong pa gser dngul gyis bkang ba'i steng du kar Sha pa Na lnga brgya bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das kyi

thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di bzhes su gsol zhes byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag 'di dag ni khyed kyis sbyin par bya ba yin gyis bram ze la byin cig /de nas khyim bdag mgon

med zas sbyin gyis gser gyi gzhong pa gang ba de bram ze la byin no/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bram ze 'dis bcom ldan
'das kyang gshegs su ma ster nas/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis kar Sha pa Na stsal ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das ci srid cig nas 'di'i bu lon chags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong

dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal

po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad

rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /de'i phyi zhig na de'i bu rab rgyal tshab

byed pa de'i dpyid kyi dus kyi tshe/ shing rnams me tog rgyas shing ngang pa dang ngur pa dang rma bya dang ne tso dang ri skegs dang khu byug dang shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na/ blon po'i bu rnams kyis g.yog byas

te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de'i grogs po blon po'i bu zhig yod pa de rgyan po byed pa'i mi gzhan zhig dang lhan cig tu cho los rtses pa las blon po'i bu de mi des kar Sha pa Na lnga brgyas pham par byas nas/

rgyal po'i bus kyang de'i gnya' byas pa las de mthu dang ldan te/ nga ni rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas ma byin no/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/ /blon po'i

bu ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yin no rgyan po byed pa ni bram ze 'di kho na yin te/ ngas gnya' byas pa las nga ni rgyal po'i bu yin no snyam nas rgyan po byed pa de la kar Sha pa Na ma byin pa des na nga 'khor ba na longs

spyod kyis phongs pa mtha' yas pa myong la da ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang 'dis bu lon bdas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa
yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur
ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya'o/ /ma byin par len pa spang ba la yang 'bad

par bya ste/ ci nas de lta bu'i nyes par mi 'gyur bar dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/ rab bzang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi

rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla

mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang

ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa grong khyer ku shi na gyad kyi nyen kor shing sA la zung gi tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba kho na'i dus kyi tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni do nub nam phyed na phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i

dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ shing sA la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims khri shoms la/ sngas byang phyogs su ston cig /de nas btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/

kun dga' bos macom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/ sA la zung gi bar du gzims khri bshams te sngas byang phyogs su bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs

la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims khri sA la zung

gi bar du bshams te/ sngas byang phyogs su bstan lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gzims khri ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas glo g.yas phyogs kyis gzims te/ zhabs gshibs nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang dran pa shes

bzhin dang ldan zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes 'ba' zhig thugs la dgongs so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer ku shi na kun tu rgyu rab bzang zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ de rgas te rnyis shing 'khogs la skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa dang grong khyer ku

shi na 'khod pa'i gyad yul pa rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te dgra bcom par 'dzin to/ /de nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis dge sbyong gau ta ma do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings

su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag chos rnams la som nyi yang yod the tsom yang yod la/ gau ta ma des bdag gi som nyi de bsal bar nus pa'i re ba yang bdag la yod do snyam nas/ thos ma

thag tu grong khyer ku shir song ste sa la zung ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi thang gi 'chag sa na 'chag cing 'dug pa kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis mthong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyang nas mthong

nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'dres nas phyogs

gcig tu sdod do/ /phyogs gcig tu bsdad nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye kun dga' bo dge sbyong gau ta ma do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das

pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis thos te bdag chos rnams la som nyi yang mchis te/ the tsom yang mchis la/ gau ta ma des bdag gi som nyi de bsal bar nus pa'i re ba yang bdag la

mchis na/ kun dga' bo gal te khyod la yang gnod pa ma mchis la gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs 'byed pa lta na bdag nang du mchis te phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /kun dga' bos smras pa/ rab bzang bcom ldan 'das

sku mnyes te bde bar gshegs pa sku 'o brgyal kyis rab bzang thong la bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ma byed cig /lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces

smras so/ /kye kun dga' bo dge sbyong gau ta ma do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis thos te bdag chos rnams la som nyi yang mchis the tsom

yang mchis la/ gau ta ma des bdag gi som nyi de bsal bar nus pa'i re ba yang bdag la mchis na/ kun dga' bo gal te khyod la yang gnod pa ma mchis la gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs 'byed pa lta na bdag nang du mchis te

phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kun tu rgyu rab bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rab bzang bcom ldan 'das sku mnyel te bde bar gshegs pa sku 'o rgyal kyis/

rab bzang thong la bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ma byed cig ces byas kyang kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye kun dga' bo gna'i kun tu rgyu rgas shing 'khogs pa sde tshan gyis

dpon chen po dag las bdag gis thos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ brgya lam brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar zad de/ dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog dang 'dra'o

zhes grag la/ gau ta ma de yang do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur na/ bdag chos rnam pa la som nyi yang mchis the tsom yang mchis la/ gau ta

ma des bdag gi som nyi de bsal bar nus pa'i re ba yang bdag la mchis na kun dga' bo gal te khyod la yong gnod pa ma mchis la/ gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs 'byed pa lta na bdag nang du mchis te phyogs 'ga' zhig

zhu'o/ /de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kun tu rgyu rab bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rab bzang bcom ldan 'das sku gnyel te bde bar gshegs pa sku 'o brgyal gyis rab bzang thong la/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ma byed

cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang skabs su gtam glengs pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas gsan to/ /gsan nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad

ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo de skad ma zer bar kun tu rgyu rab bzang ma dgag par nang du thong la ci dang ci 'dod pa 'drir chug cig /'di ni nga'i gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag dang skabs su gtam gleng ba'i tha ma yin no/ /

'di lta ste kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di ni nga'i mngon sum gyi nyan thos rnams la dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig ces bya ba'i tha ma yang yin no/ /de nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas dga' zhing mgu

la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i
gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'dres nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye gau ta ma 'jig rten na mu stegs can gyi

gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / thub med skra'i la ba can dang / kad t+ya'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen

gyi bu dang 'di rnams rang rang gi dam bcas pa rtogs pa lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ nga ni lo grangs nyi shu dgu lon na/ /dge ba gang yin tshol phyir rab tu byung / /rab bzang

nga ni rab tu byung nas kyang / /de yi phyin cad lo ni lnga bcu gcig /tshul khrims ting 'dzin rkang pa dag pa rnams/ /ngas ni rtse gcig sems kyis rab tu bsgoms/ /rigs pa'i chos kyi phyogs tsam smra ba yang / /'di las phyir

rol dge sbyong gzhan la 'ang med/ /rab bzang chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa de la ni dge sbyong dang po yang med do/ /de la ni dge sbyong gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa yang med do rab bzang chos 'dul

ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod pa de la ni dge sbyong dang po yang yod do/ /dge sbyong gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa yang yod do/ /rab bzang chos 'dul ba 'di la ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa

yod pas na/ dge sbyong dang po yang 'di la yod do/ /gnyis pa yang 'di la yod do/ /gsum pa yang 'di la yod do/ /bzhi pa yang 'di la yod do/ /'di las phyi rol pa la ni dge sbyong dang bram ze med la/ phas kyi rgol ba dag ni dge

sbyong rnams dang bram ze rnams kyis stong ste/ nga ni 'dir 'khor gyi nang du de skad ces yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na kun tu rgyu rab bzang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma

dang bral ba skyes te/ kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis chos mthong chos rnyed chos rtogs chos kyi gting slebs som nyi las rgal the tsom las rgal nas/ ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyis bkri ba med de/

chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa kun

dga' bo slob dpon chen pos/ slob dpon chen po'i nye gnas kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba de ni/ btsun pa kun dga' bos rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /gcig tu na bdag gis kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu

byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di ni legs par

gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur bar 'tshal lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu rab bzang la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag tshur shog /tshangs par spyad

pa spyod cig /de nas de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rab tu byung bar gyur te bsnyen par rdzogs pa yang de yin la dge slong gi dngos po yang de yin no/ /de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ bag yod cing

brtul la bcum nas gnas te gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos tshon can bsgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa'i tshangs par spyod pa bla na med pa'i ma

thug pa de tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te khong du chud la bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad zin to/ /bya ba ni byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so snyam du

kun shes par gyur nas/ tshe dang ldan pa de dgra bcom par gyur te sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang dgra bcom pa thob ste/ rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong nas 'di snyam du sems

te/ bdag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong bar bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ de bas ches sngar bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ der tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang ches sngar yongs su

mya ngan las 'das nas/ de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gzims mal gyi tha mar bzhugs te gnad la gnod pa'i tshor ba myong zhing gnad rnams 'chad la tshigs rnams

'bye ba na/ rab bzang dgra bcom pa nyid la bzhag pa grong khyer kun shi'i gyad yul pa mang po chos la btsud pa de'i tshe dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa

btsun pa kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di bcom ldan 'das gnad rnams 'chad cing tshigs rnams 'bye ba na/ 'khor ba'i mgul las bkrol te gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa ni ngo

mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba gti mug dang bral ba/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang

yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba'i tshe/ ngas kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'khor ba'i mgul las bkrol nas/ gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa 'di lta

la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhe sdang dang bcas pa gti mug dang bcas pa/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba

dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba na bya mi bya mi shes pa'i dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i tshe yang ngas rang gi srog yongs su btong ste/ kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang grong khyer ku shi'i gyad yul pa rnams

'jigs pa las 'jigs pa med pa la bsod pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ ri'i sul zhig na ri dgas kyi khyu'i gtso bo ri dgas stong phrag du ma'i

'khor dang ldan pa mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa zhig 'dug pa las ri dgas kyi khyu de rngon pas bya ra byas nas rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang chas te/ ri dgas kyi khyu de dag tha

thams cad khongs su bcug go/ /de nas khyu'i gtso bo de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis 'di rnams da ma bsrungs na ni deng du 'di dag gtan med par 'ong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas khyu'i gtso bos kho ra khor yug tu bltas te/ ri dgas kyi

tshogs 'di dag phyogs gang logs nas thar bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/ /des ri'i sul de na chu klung 'bab pa zhig mthong ste/ chu klung de yang shugs drag cing drag tu khyer bar byed pa zhig yin la ri dgas de dag kyang nyam chung ba sha stag go/ /

de nas khyu'i gtso bo de tsham tshom med par chu klung de'i nang du zhugs te dbus su sdod nas/ khyed tshur shog la 'gram 'di nas mchongs te/ nga'i rgyab tu rkang lag gi stegs chos la pha rol gyi 'gram du song shig dang thabs des na khyed thar bar

mthong gi de ltar ma byas na ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes skad kyis bos so/ /de nas ri dgas de dag gis de bzhin du byas so/ /de nas de'i rgyab tu rmig pa btsugs pas lpags pa rdol nas/ sha dang khrag dang rus pa'i lhag ma tsam zhig

lus par zad de/ 'on kyang de ri dgas de dag la snying rje btud pas brtson pa ma btang ngo / /de nas ri dgas thams cad rgal ba'i 'og tu 'dir ma rgal ba 'ga' lta med grang snyam ste/ phyir bltas na ri dgas kyi phru gu gcig

da dung ma rgal ba mthong ngo / /de nas khyu'i gtso bo de gnad rnams 'chad cing tshigs rnams 'bye ba na/ srog phangs pa la ma bltas te 'gram du byung nas ri dgas kyi phru gu rgyab tu zhon te/ chu klung bsgral nas 'gram

du bzhag ste/ ri dgas kyi tshogs de dag rgal zin par mthong nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag gis ri dgas 'di rnams dang ri dgas kyi phru gu 'di srog phangs pa bskyabs te phangs pa las skyabs byas

pa de bzhin du/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang 'khor ba'i 'gug las thar bar byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dgas kyi khyu'i gtso bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/ /ri dgas rnams ni grong khyer ku shi'i gyad yul pa 'di rnams yin no/ /ri dgas phru gu de ni rab

bzang 'di kho na yin no/ /de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rab bzang gis las ci dag bgyis na des mngon sum gyi nyan thos rnams kyi tha

mar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rab bzang nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i
las rnams byas shing bsags pas na/ rab bzang gis las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i

khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye
mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong

dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar

gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na ri dgas kyi nags

drang srong smra ba na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dpon po mya ngan med ces bya ba thar pa 'dod pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung nas/ de thar pa la rang dbang

yod pa tsam du 'dzin te brtson 'grus ma byas so/ /re shig na yun ring mo zhig lon pa'i 'og tu mya ngan med kyis ljongs su dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung

yang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du gzims mal kyi tha mar bzhugs so/ /dge slong mya ngan med kyang / shing mya ngan 'tshang gi drung na nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs so/ /de nas shing

mya ngan 'tshang de la gnas pa'i lha des bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes thos nas ngu zhing 'dug ste/ de ngu ba'i mchi ma zags pa mya ngan med kyi lus la bab bo/ /

de nas mya ngan med kyis gyen du bltas nas/ lha ngu ba de la smras pa/ lha ci'i phyir ngu / lhas smras pa/ do nub nam phyed na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /

de nas mya ngan med kyis lha'i tshig thos nas gnad du phog pa bzhin du yed ces byas te/ de yang snying rje rje skad du ngus so/ /de lhas dris pa khyod ci'i phyir ngu / mya ngan med kyis smras pa/ nye du dang bral ba dang mkhan po dang

bral ba'i phyir te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ni bdag gi zhang po yin pas bdag bsod nyams su 'dug 'dug ste brtson 'grus ma byas so/ /da ni de lam rings la bdag ni so so'i skye bor

lus te/ lam rings pas bdag gis khyad par thob par mi nus so/ /lhas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du khyod bkri na ci khyad par thob par nus sam/ mya ngan med kyis smras pa/ 'di ltar

bdag gi yid la/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu khyad par thob par 'gyur ro snyam byed do/ /de nas lhas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ mya ngan med bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du khyer te/ des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas

dga' ba skyes so/ /dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gang thos pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ thog ma kho nar tshe dang

ldan pa mya ngan med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas lha des tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan med yongs su mya ngan las

'das pa mthong nas dga' ba skyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dis khyad par ci thob pa thams cad ni bdag las bsten pa yin gyis bdag kyang 'di bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de/ gzims

mal gyi tha mar zhugs pa na bdag kyang de'i mngon sum gyi nyan thos kyi tha mar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snga rol tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'

bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na lhar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab bzang 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge ba'i

grogs po dang dge ba'i sten dang gnas par bya'i sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po dang sdig pa'i rten dang gnas par mi bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa

kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'dir bdag gcig pu dben par mchis nas/ nga nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa na sems la 'di lta bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge

ba'i grogs po dang dge ba'i sten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed lags kyi/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po dang sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma lags so snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'

bo khyed 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge ba'i grogs po dang dge ba'i brten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed yin gyi/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po dang sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma yin no zhes ma zer cig /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge ba'i grogs po dang dge ba'i sten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ril po dang ma 'dres pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang yongs su dag pa dang yongs su byang ba yin gyi/

sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po dang sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba'i chos can las

yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba dang sems can rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags

'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa'i chos can las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo de bas na rnam grangs 'di kho nas khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ 'di lta ste dge ba'i

bshes gnyen dang dge ba'i grogs po dang dge ba'i rten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ril po dang ma 'dres pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang yongs su dag pa dang yongs su byang ba yin gyi/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po

dang sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma yin no zhes kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do/ /rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa ste byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs rnams rdzogs so// // sdom ni/ bu ram gnas dang kha zas dang / /chu dang phyi sa'i snod rnams dang / /maud gal

bu dang chu smad dang / /dmus long dang ni tshong dpon dang / /bu rnams dang ni phyi sa khung / /sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/ /bu ram 'tshir ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen

po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams

dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka

gnas pa na bzhugs te/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis 'di ltar dam bcas te/

sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams kyi nang nas/ sems can gcig tsam yang thar bar ma byas kyi bar du zan mi bza'o zhes byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa de gnyis dus dus su res 'ga' ni sems can dmyal bar rgyu zhing 'gro'o/ /

res 'ga' ni dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu zhing 'gro'o/ /res 'ga' ni yi dags kyi nang du rgyu zhing 'gro ste de gnyis kyis der sems can gnod pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa rnams kyi skad ngan thos nas rgyu ba las slar 'khor te/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la brjod

par byed do/ /de dag gis kyang thos nas skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de gnyis kyis de la bsten nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos ston par byed de/ des na sems can du mas thos nas khyad par thob par 'gyur ba dang chos thos pa dang gtam bya ba'i

gnas su 'gyur ro/ /phyis re shig na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yi dags kyi nang du rgyu zhing song ba dang / yi dags lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ rang gi skras yog pa/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab

tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang bshang gci ga la yod pa der 'khor la de yang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig

mthong ngo / /de nas gnas brtan des yi dags de la dris pa/ kye khyod kyis las ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag pa mi zad pa tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug /yi dags kyis smras pa/ nyi ma shar

ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / des khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe

bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom

ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der

bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu tshur shog /khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da gdod ga las 'ongs/ maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa

bdag ni yi dags kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dags lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ rang gi skras yog pa/ phyi sa bzhin dri nga ba mchog tu dri nga ba mi sdug pa mchog tu

mi sdug pa zas su phyi sa 'tshal la de yang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/ /mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug /rang gi skras ni gdong yog gcer bar

mchis/ /mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu rid/ /de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa/ /rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/ /thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la/ /ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid/ /bkres pa dang ni skom pa

yi/ /dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen/ /nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs

su rung ba myong bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu yi dags de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /maud gal

gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin

pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa de'i bu ram shing btsir ba'i gnas grwa lnga brgya yod de/ de dag tu de'i bu ram shing 'tshir bar byed do/ /sangs rgyas rnams

'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste re shig na/ rang sangs rgyas sdug

cing phongs pa la snying brtse ba bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba zhig byung nas/ de snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo / /btsun pa de yang nad khong

skem gyis thebs te/ de la sman pas bu ram shing gi khu ba phan par bstan nas tshong dpon chen po de'i thad du song ngo / /tshong dpon gyis kyang rang sangs rgyas lus kyang mdzes la/ sems kyang mdzes pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang

tshong dpon gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci bzhed/ rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag bu ram shing gi khu ba 'dod do/ /de nas khyim bdag des tshal za zhig la 'phags pa la bu ram shing gi khu ba phul cig ces bsgo

nas khyim bdag da ni don zhig la phyi rol tu chas so/ /de nas mi de gzhan gyi rdzas la ser sna skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis 'di la bu ram shing gi khu ba sbyin du zin na phyis kyang 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ mi sdug
pa'i 'gro ba gsum gyi g.yang sar gzhol ba/ thams cad kyis 'dod par bya ba'i 'gro ba gnyis bor ba/ 'phags pa'i lam rnams thag bsrings pa des sdig pa'i sems bskyed nas/ rang sangs rgyas de la smras

pa/ dge slong lhung bzed tshur byin cig dang / bu ram shing gi khu ba sbyin no zhes byas so/ /nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste/ sdug cing phongs pa

la snying brtse bas mi de la ngas phan gdags par bya'o snyam nas lhung bzed de byin no/ /de nas spyod pa ngan cing snying la snying rje med pa des de blangs te lkog gcig tu song nas gcin gis bkang ste/ steng du bu ram shing gi khu ba'i dbu
bas bkab nas/ rang sangs rgyas de la phul ba dang / des tshor nas des bsams pa nyon mongs 'dis sdig pa chen po zhig byas snyam ste/ de phyogs gcig tu song nas pho ste song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshal zar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dags 'di yin te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur la da ltar

yang yi dags su gyur nas sdug bsngal mi zad pa myong ba yin no/ /maud gal gyi bu de bas na/ ci nas yi dags de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/ /maud gal gyi bu de ltar
na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /
las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /maud gal gyi bu de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba'

shig la btad par bya ste/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding

dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //kha zas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon

po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams

dang lto 'phye rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon

med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po nyin par gnas pa'i phyir/ shing zhig gi drung du 'dug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/ yi dags mo zhig gi sgra thos te

nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing / sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste/ kha zas slong zhing grogs mo dag bdag bkres so/ /grogs mo dag bdag skom mo zhes zer ba thos so/ /

de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos yi dags mo de mthong nas dris pa/ khyod kyis las ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal dag myong zhing 'dug /yi dags mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi

dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / des khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom

ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos

ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi

bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu tshur shog /khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dags kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las

slar mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dags mo lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ rang gi skras yog pa/ gcer bar mchis shing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi

'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ /lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/ /mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug /rang gi skras ni gdong yog gcer bar mchis/ /mchu sgo phra khab

mig 'dra rab tu rid/ /de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa/ /rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/ /thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la/ /ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid/ /bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis/ /dub cing sdug

bsngal dag gis nyen/ /nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs su

rung ba myong bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mod gal gyi bu yi dags mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /maud gal

gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung

ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas grong khyer bA rA Na sI de na khyim bdag gcig gi chung ma ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byed rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khwa la 'ang gtor ma mi ster na slong ba gzhan dag

lta la smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod de/ de dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkres pa dag mthong na sems kyis sdang bar byed do/ /re shig na bsod snyoms pa zhig de'i khyim du 'ongs nas/ des de mthong na/ ser sna skyes te/

sems kyang sdang bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis 'di la bkur stir byas na ni/ 'di phyis kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas sdig can des tshe phyi ma'i mi sdug pa khyad du bsad nas/ dge slong de nang du bos te sgo

bcad nas smyung du bcug go/ /mang du yang spyos te/ dge slong khyod la bkur sti ma yin pa byas pa 'di yin gyis/ phyin cad khyim 'dir ma 'ong shig ces byas so/ /de nas de ser sna kun tu sten cing bsgos te mang du byas pa des yi dags

su skyes te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo / /maud gal gyi bu de bas na ci nas yi dags mo de'i nyes pa gang yin pa de lta bu dag mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spong ba la brtson par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces

bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //

chu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams

dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang

lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang

sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yi dags kyi nang du rgyu zhing song ba dang /

yi dags mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la

skom gyis gdungs te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang khron pa rnams skams par 'gyur ba dang gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe/ de'i steng du me

stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de la smras pa/ kye khyod kyis sdig pa ci zhig byas na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug /yi

dgas mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems

can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi

po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar/ bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog /'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu

tshur shog /khyod 'ongs pa legs so khyod da bzod ga las 'ongs/ maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dags kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dags mo sdong po me reg 'dra

la rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la skom gyis gdungs te/ sdug bsngal

drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe de'i steng du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab

pa zhig mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu yi dags mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /maud

gal gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs pa na/ der dge slong zhig lam du zhugs nas de skom gyis gdungs te/ khron pa'i drung du song nas de na bu

mo zhig bum pa chus bkang ste/ 'dug pa la dge slong des smras pa/ che zhe bdag ni skom gyis gdungs kyis chu byin cig ces byas na yo byad la kun tu 'dzin pa de ser sna skyes nas/ dge slong de la smras pa/ dge slong bdag gi bum

pa 'gribs su 'ong gis/ gal te khyod shi na yang chu mi sbyin no zhes byas so/ /de nas dge slong de skom gyis gdungs bzhin du re thag chad nas song ngo / /de nas bu mo de ser sna kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas

pa de lta bus shi nas yi dags su skyes te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug go/ /maud gal gyi bu de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ser sna spang bar

bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o zhes maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang

mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ phyi sa'i snod ces

bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod

sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang

nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams

brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms

la song nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas te/ zan zos nas zas phyis len pa spangs te lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzegs te/ nyin par

gnas pa'i phyir shing gcig gi drung du rten cing 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos yi dags mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha khab kyi mig

tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba phyi sa bzhin

du dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga ba zas su phyi sa za la de yang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas yi dags mo la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon sdig

pa ci zhig byas na des 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu myong zhing 'dug /yi dags mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang

de khyed la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song

ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo

bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum

pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu tshur shog /khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni

yi dags kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las der bdag gis yi dags mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la/ gcer bur mchis shing rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la shin tu rab tu 'bar te

me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe char 'bab pa

de'i tshe de'i steng du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa dang / phyi sa bzhin du dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga ba zas su phyi sa 'tshal la/ de yang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ nyam thag skad kyang

'byin par byed/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /gang na phyi sa'i gnas yod pa/ /der ni sdug bzhin rgyug par bgyid/ /phyi sa bza' 'am btung snyam na/ /de yang bde blag rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /

sdig pa rab 'jigs ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba nyams su myong / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu yi dags mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan

par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /maud gal gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /mo+od gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs

pa la snying brtse ba bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba zhig yod la/ de yang nad bu can zhig ste bA rA na sIr bsod snyoms la song ngo / /re shig na de la sman pas 'thun pa'i zas bstan nas de tshong dpon zhig 'dug pa ga la ba der song ba dang /

tshong dpon des kyang mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod ci bzhed/ des smras pa/ mthun pa'i kha zas 'dod do/ /de nas tshong dpon des 'phags pa la kha zas 'thun pa phul cig ces mna' ma la bsgo'o/ /de nas de'i mna' ma ser sna

skyes te/ gal te bdag gis deng 'di la kha zas sbyin du zin na sang yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ phyogs gcig tu song ste lhung bzed phyi sas bkang nas steng 'bras can gyis bkab ste rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo/ /nyan

thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste des blangs so/ /blangs nas tshor te/ 'di dri nga ba las na 'dis phyi sas bkang gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po des de ga zhig

tu bor nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu de ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi mna' mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dags mo 'di yin te/ des sdig pa'i las de lta bu byas

nas/ de phyin cad rtag tu sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams su skyes te rtag tu zas su phyi sa za bar gyur to/ /maud gal gyi bu de bas na ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ ci nas yi dags mo de'i nyes

pa de lta bu dag 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding

dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //maud gal gyi bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang

blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang

mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i

tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi ni pha rol 'od ma'i tshal gyi tshu rol/ de'i bar skabs na yi dags mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri

tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams

su myong ba lnga brgya khwa khyus lding ba bzhin du nam mkha' la 'khor te gang du yang 'dug sa mi rnyed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod

snyoms la song ba dang des yi dags de dag mthong ngo / /yi dags de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gcig tu 'dril nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du dong ste phyin nas/

snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smra bar tshig 'thun par smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu bdag cag ni rgyal po'i khab tu tshong dpon lnga brgyar gyur te/ bdag cag ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams

la kun tu 'dzin par gyur nas/ bdag cag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa ma byin la/ gzhan dag sbyin pa byed pa la yang bgegs byas so/ /sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la yang yi dags kyi tshig lta bus mang du spyos te khyed ni yi

dgas su skyes pa bzhin du gzhan gyi khyim phyi nyug pa zhes byas so/ /des na bdag cag shi ba'i 'og tu 'di lta bu'i yi dags su skyes so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de bas na bdag cag gi nye du rgyal po'i khab na
gnas pa de dag la/ bdag cag gi las kyi rnam pa shes par mdzod la dad pa dris te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas/ bdag cag gi slad du yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig /

'on kyang bdag cag yi dags kyi skye gnas nas thar kyang srid do zhes gsungs cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus kyang yi dags rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi

bus de dag nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs so/ /yi dags rnams la yang sbran te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi

dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs kyis khyed kyang der shog cig ces byas so/ /de dag gi nye du rnams la yang khyed kyang shog cig dang / nye du'i mchod ston byed pa der yi dags de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro

zhes byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu nyid mchod ston gyi zhal ta byed pa la zhugs so/ /de nas nam langs nas zhal zas bshams te/ gdugs tshod la bab na yi dags de dag mi snang ngo / /de nas

tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i mig gis yi dags de dag bsams na yul ma ga d+hA thog thag na yang mi snang la/ mthar gyis gling bzhi'i bar du bltas na yang de na yang mi snang ngo / /de nas ji srid du de'i ye shes mthong

ba 'jug pa de srid du bltas kyang de na yang mi snang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams mi gda'

lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu thong la khyod mi dgar ma byed cig /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag yod de/ de dag tu

las kyi rlung gis 'phangs mod kyi/ 'on kyang maud gal gyi bu deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la ltos shig /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mngon par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi

rnam par 'phrul pa yang bstan gyis gaN DI rdungs shig /de nas gaN DI brdungs pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyang 'dus/ yi dags kyi nye du rnams dang yi dags mthong bar 'dod pa'i sems can gzhan dag

kyang ltad mo la lhags te 'dus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas yi dags rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag

gi phyir nye du rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing 'khod do snyam du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan
lag lnga dang ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / /de ni yi dags phyi bzhin song / /yi dags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de dag myur du thar gyur cig /ces gsungs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas ser sna'i dri ma spangs te bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /yi dags de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la

sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las

gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas yi dags las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i

lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon te bzod bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas

sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul du thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprika la la sogs

pas byugs pa de rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu ta dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od
chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams

kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis khyad par chen po thob bo/ /de dag tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa bzhin du

gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis yi dags mang po dag lha'i nang du

bkod nas de dag kyang mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ de dag la ngas chos bstan nas de dag gis rnyed par bya ba rnyed de mthong bar 'gyur ba rnyed nas/ dong ba de ni khyod kyis zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yod par gyur te legs so legs so/ /

de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de dag gi nye du rnams la yang shes par byas te/ de dag gis thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas bkur sti byas so/ /maud gal gyi bu de bas

na khyod kyis ci nas yi dags de dag gi nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang lha dang lha ma

yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //chu smad ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la

rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang /

mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes

pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab

na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa rgya che zhing yangs pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/

rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas

de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u zhig btsas nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rgyu skar chu smad la btsas

pas na de'i phyir ming chu smad ces gdags so zhes zer nas de'i ming chu smad ces btags so/ /de nas khye'u chu smad bsrings bskyed de cher skyes nas/ de'i pha shi ba dang rang gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to/ /de nas des tshong 'dus

bkram nas nyo 'tshong byed cing nyo 'tshong gis 'tsho bar byed pa las de nyin gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ de bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang dam pa'i chos thos pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par gyur
nas de rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes te/ des ma la gsol ba btab pa/ yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig /de nas de'i mas smras pa/ bu khyod ni bu gcig pa yin

gyis bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar rab tu ma byung shig /bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ci bya ba byos shig ces zer ro/ /chu smad des kyang ci rnyed pa de dag thams cad ma la byin te/ yum 'dis dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa

dang bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shig ces byas so/ /de'i ma de ni brkam chags can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa zhig ste kar Sha pa Na de dag sbas nas/ dge slong dang bram ze gang dag zas 'dod de

khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgya zhing khyed ni yi dags su skyes pa bzhin du khyim phyi nyug cing slong ngo zhes zer ro/ /bu de la yang slu bar byed de/ bdag gis nyin gcig bzhin du dge slong 'di snyed 'di snyed cig la zan byin no zhes zer ro/ /

phyis re shig na de shi ba dang de yi dags su skyes nas bu chu smad ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed do/ /sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang

bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad

chod do/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil

du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur

sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur nas/ des chu klung gang gA'i 'gram du lo ma'i spyil po byas te bsam gtan byed do/ /de'i ma yi dags

kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa de yang sdong dum me reg 'dra la gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/

tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyi thad du song nas re shig na chu smad kyis yi dags mo de mthong nas dris pa/ 'di kho na 'dra ba khyod su zhig /yi dags mos smras pa/ bu gcig gang
las btsas pa yi/ /byams pa'i ma ni bdag yin te/ /zas dang skom dang bral ba yi/ /yi dags rnams kyi nang du skyes/ /bdag ni shi ba'i dus 'das nas/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon te/ /chu yi bag

kyang ma mthong na/ /kha zas lta zhig ga la mthong / /'bras bur ldan pa'i shing rnams kyi/ /drung song de dag 'bras med 'gyur/ /gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag song yang / /de dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur/ /
btsun pa'i shing drung bde ba lags/ /khyod kyi snod nang chu yang bsil/ /bkren pa bdag la thugs rje skyed/ /skom gyis gdungs kyis chab stsol cig /de nas chu smad kyis ma la smras pa/ yum khyod
mir gyur pa'i tshe bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed du ma bcug gam/ yi dags mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni ser snas non pas sbyin pa dag kyang ma byin bsod nams dag kyang
ma byas te/ nor rnyed pa de dag thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sbas so/ /bu gcig de bas na dad pa dris la bdag gi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas
yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig /'on kyang bdag yi dags kyi skye gnas nas thar yang srid do/ /chu smad kyis smras pa/ de ltar bgyi yis khyod kyang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug shig /yi
dgas mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag gi gcer bur 'dug pas ngo tsha ste ngos mi thub bo/ /chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa byed pa de'i tshe ngo mi tsha na da ltar 'bras bu myong

ba'i tshe ci'i phyir ngo tsha/ yi dags mos smras pa/ 'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o/ /de nas chu smad kyis nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos

la spyan drangs nas/ gdugs tshod la bab pa na sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag kyang 'dus/ yi dags mo de yang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa rnams kyis yi dags mo de mthong ngo / /de dag

gis yi dags mo de'i lus mi sdug pa mthong nas shin du skyo ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang

pos tshim par byas nas/ yi dags mo'i phyir yon gyi rabs gdon par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / /de ni yi

dgas phyi bzhin song / /yi dags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de ni myur du thar gyur cig /ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten nas yi dags mo de dang skye bo mang po la de dang mthun pa'i chos

bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag du mas de thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /yi dags mo de yang sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis kyang yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen

mor skyes par shes so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum da ni mthu yod kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba dag gyis shig /yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' ba med de

mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/ chags pa'i mun pas mig ni rab bsgribs te/ /khyod kyis yi dags 'jig rten bsgrubs pa yi/ /khyod kyi rus bu chen po sha med

pa/ /rus pa lpags pa skyi rnams da dung 'dug /ces byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis lan mang du spyos nas smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu de las ras zung gcig thob bo/ /de nas chu smad kyis dge 'dun

la phul te/ gang gis dge 'dun las ras zung shig nyos pa'i dge slong des gos kyi rdang la bzhag go/ /de nas yi dags mo de mtshan mo 'ongs nas rkus so/ /de nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad nas

chu smad song ste yi dags mo spyos nas phyir bkug ste byin no/ /de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong de las rkus nas/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug te byin pa dang / dge slong des kyang de gshags nas/ phyogs

bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stan la klan to/ /de nas des phyin chad ma rkus so/ /de bas na sems can rnams la de ltar ser snas mtho 'tsham par byed pa mthong nas/ ci nas kyang yi dags mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu

dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po
la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //dmus long zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang

phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams

kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams

chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med

zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo / /mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms

byas nas zan zos te zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag ste yi dags kyi yul du rgyu zhing song ba las/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis yi dags mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la dmus long du

'dug pa rang gi skras yog pa lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor nas phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing bcad cing za ba dang / de gnad la bab ste

bkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed mi dga' bar gyur nas dris pa/ sring mo khyod

kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug yi dags mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang de khyod la bdag gi

las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag

'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang ldan pa'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan

no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan

pa dga' byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' byed tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da bzod ga las 'ongs/ dga' byed kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dags rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te/ der

bdag gis yi dags mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la dmus long du mchis pa rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor nas phyogs kun

nas sha bkum zhing bkum zhing 'tshal ba dang / de gnad la bab bste bkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so/ /yang

gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/ /mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug /rang gi skras ni gdong yog gcer bur mchis/ /mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu rid/ /de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa/ /rus pa'i 'phrul

'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/ /thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la/ /ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid/ /bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis/ /dub cing sdug bsngal dag gi nyen/ /nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /

de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' byed yi dags mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed

byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /dga' byed 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus

na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes

bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /

de nas grong khyer bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos 'dod de/ des chos thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te/ des pha ma la gsol nas bcom

ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de nas de'i phyir nye du rnams kyis dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas/ de de na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las re shig na des bag med pa'i dbang gis bslab

pa'i bzhi la lhod par byas so/ /de nas dge slong ma rnams gyis tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyir bskrad do/ /de nas des sbyin bdag khyim bdag rnams dad pas nges par 'bul ba 'ang gcod du bcug /slob pa dang mi slob pa'i

dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag mthong na yang mig btsums te 'dug go/ /dga' byed ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni yi

dgas mo 'di yin te/ des gtsug lag khang la ser sna byas pa des ni yi dags su skyes so/ /des nor ma bcad pa des ni khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor to/ /des slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams

kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas ni de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to/ /dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na mig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyur to/ /dga' byed de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam

par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur

ro/ /dga' byed de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste dga' byed khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na srog chags sa yas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i nyes dmigs de dag dang gzhan

dag kyang rtogs nas/ ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang
nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding

rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis

mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas mnyan

du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing

rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de phyi zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu
chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po

che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kun la grags pa

dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur to/ /des yongs su bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed do cog gsog par byed de des tshangs pa

mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bgo bsha' ma byas so/ /de nas ser sna kun du sten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des na rang gi yo byad la lhag par zhen bzhin du shi nas rang gi gnas khang du yi dags su

skyes so/ /de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gaN DI mjug med pa brdungs nas rus bu phyir phyung ngo / /de nas de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas phyir gtsug lag khang du lhags so/ /

de nas gnas khang gi sgo phye ste/ chos gos dang lhung bzed g.yar snga 'grim pa la zhugs pa dang / re shig na yi dags rkang lag dang mig mi sdug la lus mchog tu 'jigs pa chos gos dang lhung bzed 'dzin
cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo / /de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas dge slong dag mi dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan kyis rigs kyi bu de la phan gdags pa dang slob ma'i

tshogs rnams skyo ba bskyed pa dang ser sna'i rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te gnas der gshegs so/ /

de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas

lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes te ngo tsha bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char sprin gyi

'brug sgra lta bur zab pa dang / rnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gis yi dags de spyos te bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung bzed 'di bsgrubs te/ des na yi dags su skyes pa yin gyis/ da yang nga

la sems dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la yang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so/ /'di las kyang shi nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye sta re/ de nas yi dags des chos gos dang lhung bzed dge 'dun la
phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dags kyi phyir yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / /de ni yi dags phyi
bzhin song / /yi dags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de ni myur du thar gyur cig /de nas yi dags de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so/ /de nas yi dags

rdzu 'phrul chen po rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi

mtshan mo/ lha'i me tog ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom

ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo / /de'i tshe dge

slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /de mthong nas the tsom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom
