ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ yi dags de shi nas yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes te/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas

ngas de la chos bstan te de dga' ba skyes nas song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na ci nas tshong dpon las yi dags su gyur pa de'i nyes pa de lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste dge slong khyed kyis de

ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das

kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon

rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang

klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang gzims cha dang zhal zas dang

gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham

thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo / /rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te zas phyis len pa spangs nas chos gos dang lhung bzed bzhag ste/ yi

dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba dang / des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i nye 'khor tu yi dags mo gshin rje'i sring mo 'dra ba la/ lus khrag gis bsgos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu

lnga lnga btsa' zhing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yod bzhin du de bkres pas nyen nas de dag za zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas gnas brtan 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus de la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon las ci zhig

byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug /yi dags mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyed la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par

'gyur te/ de thos nas sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog

las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no

cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dam

bu sbyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da bzod ga las 'ongs/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yi dags kyi nang du mchi mchi ba las slar
mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dags mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra ba la/ lus khrag gis bgos pa/ dur khrod na gnas pa bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ bdag ni nyin bzhin

bu lnga btsa'/ /mtshan yang de bzhin lnga btsa' ste/ /btsas nas de dag zos na yang / /'grangs par mi 'gyur zhes mchi na/ /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di

'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu yi dags mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par

'tshal lags so/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mnga'

longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga'

la dga' dgur spyod do rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med de de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu

ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas bud med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang / chu lha dang ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang

lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang sum mdo'i lha dang gtor ma len pa'i lha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang chos 'thun pa pa dang rtag tu

phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i

rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/

pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur to/ des lha mnyes par byas kyang bu yang ma

byung bu mo yang ma byung nas de'i blo 'di lta bu dag skyes te/ ma la bdag gis chun ma zhig blangs na/ brgya la bu yod par 'gyur lta srid dam snyam ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu

rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo bo bdag la sras chags te
bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/ khye'ur 'byung bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so/ /de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/ /

bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo / /bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig /mi rung bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig /gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig /nor skal

la spyod par shog cig /bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog cig bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis

gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/ /de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag

ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tshwa

che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams dang / kha ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang mngar ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba med pa'i

zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa

gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/ /de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing gces par byed pa mthong nas phrag dog skyes te bsams pa/ gal te 'di las bu btsas par gyur

na ni bdag la gnod pa byed par gyur gyis/ ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos snyam mo/ /'dod pa las yongs su bsten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci yang med de/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar kha ltas pa des

yid rngon du bcug nas/ gang 'thungs pa tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'phyil bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin no/ /de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma snga ma de zhal che la bkug ste/

khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug nas mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin te des bdag gi bu 'phyil to zhes byas so/ /de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyi nang du mna' bor te/ gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin par

gyur na bdag yi dags mor gyur te/ bu byung ngo cog za bar shog cig ces so/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dags mo de yin te/ des sngon phrag dog byas pa des

na yi dags mor skyes so/ /des brdzun byas te mna' bor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing za bar gyur to/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ngag gi nyes pa spang ba la brtson

par bya ste/ ci nas yi dags mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu

dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod

pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ phyi sa khung zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon

rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas

te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims

cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs

shig gi nang na yi dags zas su skyugs pa za ba/ bor ba za ba ngar snabs dang gcin gyis 'tsho ba rnag dang khrag dang phyi sa za ba mi bzad pa rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba lnga brgya gnas so/ /yang smras pa/ skyugs pa za zhing bor ba za/ /ngar

snabs gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang / /rnag khrag dang ni phyi sa za/ /mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug /yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing

dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/ de dag na re 'di ni lto na khye'u 'dug pa de'i

mthu yin no zhes zer ro/ /re shig na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u mdog ngan zhing lta na mi sdug la byad ngan pa lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri nga ba zhig btsas so/ /de mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi byams pa'i

dbang gis sbrel bas pha ma gnyis kyis gsos so/ /de mi gtsang ba'i gnas rnams 'ba' zhig tu dga' la phyag dar gyi phung po dang phyi sa khung du skra 'bal zhing khar mi gtsang ba 'jug nas de'i ming phyi sa khung phyi sa khung zhes bya bar gyur to/ /

re shig na de phan tshun du 'khyam pa las 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas rnams su dga' ba las na 'di ni gor ma chag par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyis bdag gis 'di rab tu

dbyung ngo snyam mo/ /des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'khyam zhing 'dug la legs pa byed pa la yang gnas so/ /de nas de 'khyam zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs kyi nang na yi dags lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sngon gyi

las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang du song nas de dag dang lhan cig 'dus shing phrad de dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to/ /phyis re shig na khye'u phyi sa khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du

song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas/ yi dags de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus

mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag phongs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cis phongs yi dags rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni skom lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga phab ste/ des yi dags lnga brgya po de dag tshim par mdzad do/ /de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul

bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'i chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas yi dags las shi

'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/

bdag cag zhag lon te bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i

lha'i bu rna cha gdub 'khor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprika la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams

kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom

ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams

dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu lnga brgyas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/

rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang

gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas khye'u phyi sa khung grong khyer gyi 'obs su 'ongs pa dang yi dags

ma mthong ngo / /de nas tshol ba la zhugs te de de dag yongs su tshol bas skyo bar gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed do/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am mi gzigs pa 'am mi rtogs

pa 'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa gnyis su mi gsung

ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi la brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin

tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa 'gro ba lnga las yang dag

par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/

mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/

chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod

pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar byas su ni

'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las

yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul

bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phyi sa khung la phan gdags pa'i phyir snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs

kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re shig na mthar gyis bsod snyoms bskor te/ srang du gshegs na phyi sa khung yang phan tshun 'khor

'khor te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'greng ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas

pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de'i mod la des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas so/ /

de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bdag cag lta bu yang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu 'byung ba

mchis te/ chud par 'gyur na bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba mkhyen pas de shin tu skal ba dang ldan par

thugs su chud nas phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu ni

bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur pa/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur

zhes bka' stsal pas/ /de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ /mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung

phog ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brten par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig

pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam

mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa

dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin na yang ngan pa la dga' bar gyur nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong

rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ nga'i dge slong phyi sa khung 'di ni nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ngan ngon la mos pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/ /de nas dge slong dag /the tsom skyes te/
the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gnas brtan phyi sa khung gis las ci bgyis na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag phyi sa khung nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/

phyi sa khung nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i

khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la smin par 'gyur
ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang

po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu

gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhugs so/ /

de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag gcig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang gnas par sems so gtsug lag khang de na so so'i

skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/ de yang gnas la shin tu ser sna che ba zhig ste dge slong gsar du 'ong ba rnams mthong na tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed de/ zhul zhul por 'dug cing 'khrug pa skyed par

byed do/ /dge slong gang dag gtsug lag khang de nas gud du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/ shas cher dga' zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel zhing smra bar byed do/ /phyis re shig na ga zhig gi yul nas dge slong dgra

bcom pa zhig 'ongs so/ /gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de yang phyir mi 'ong ba yin te/ des spyod lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin par shes so/ /de nas dga' ba skyes te phyi de nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par

cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la spyan drangs so/ /dge slong gzhi ba de ni de na med pa las re shig na phyi de nyin cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul bshos kyang bshams pa las dge slong gzhi ba de yang 'ongs te/

de yang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus sar song nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyed rings su byung ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas de phrag dog skyes nas/ des sdang

ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/ dge slong khyed ni lus mi gtsang bas byugs kyang sla'i sbyin bdag 'di lta bu bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes byas so/ /de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs pa

'di las ches mi bzad pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas cang mi zer bar dang du blangs so/ /re shig na tshogs par gyur te gro la bab pa na dge slong gzhi ba des dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis sdang ba'i sems

bskyed do zhes zer ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa skyes so/ /de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod la tshig rtsub po smras pa de bzod par gsol lo zhes byas so/ /de

nas dgra bcom pa des de'i dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /de nas lhag par yang 'gyod pa skyes te/ de nas de'i mdun du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing

bshags te shad kyis sbyangs so/ /'on kyang des mthar thug pa'i ye shes bskyed ni ma nus so/ /de nas re shig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa dang des smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang ngag gi

las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa ni bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig /bdag gis klags pa dang / kha don byas pa dang sbyin pa dang sbyin pa chen po dag byin pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par

smin pa gang yin pa des ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par shog cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhi bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyi sa khung 'di nyid yin te/

des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur te/ las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas de ltar srid pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe yang / 'di ltar dri nga zhing mchog

tu dri nga bar gyur la mi gtsang ba dang snyag snyig la dga' bar gyur to/ /des kha thon byas pa dang phung po la mkhas pa dang khams la mkhas pa dang skye mched la mkhas pa dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang gnas dang gnas

ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ser sna spang ba la

brtson par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi sa khung so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dge slong khyod kyis de

ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan

'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs so// // sdom ni/ sbrul nag dang ni zla ba dang / /sa la dang ni dpal ldan ma/ /gos dang ne

tso pho nya dang / /ma he dang ni gso sbyong dang / /ngang pa tha mar brjod pa yin/ /sbrul nag po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor

gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/

bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang

ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /

de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/

de yang ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khwa la yang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa dag mthong na sems sdang bar byed do/ /de nas des

rang gi skyed mos tshal du gser dngul gyi phung po chen po sbas te bzhag nas/ de de la chags te lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o/ /de shi nas de nyid kyi steng du sbrul gdug pa sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig du

skyes so/ /de nas skyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog thag tu yang che ge mo'i bskyed mos tshal du song ba de dag thams cad

brlag par 'gyur ro zhes sgra grag par gyur to/ /skye bo'i tshogs gyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma

gtogs pa de 'dul nus pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyis gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /

yang dag par gzeng stod yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzeng stod yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung
bar bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig na sbrul gdug pa/ sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/
skye bo mang po brlag par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /
de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan

'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma

stong gi 'od pas lag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad snang bar byas so/ /bskal pa stong gi bar du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i
lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to/ /de nas sbrul gdug pa des phan tshun du bltas te su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur zhig gu snyam pa dang / /des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes

bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo

'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems skyed de/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/

bzhin bzangs dag khyod nyid kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug par lhung bar byas so/ /da yang nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la gter 'di la yang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so/ /'di nas shi
'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skyes re/ de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa de'i tshe de ngus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka'

stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/ /da ni nga yis ci byar med/ /mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis/ /don med ngus pas ci la phan/ /'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/ /nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas

spangs na legs/ /'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das gyis sbrul de lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ 'od ma'i tshal du bsnams so/ /de'i skabs su rgyal po dang yul ma ga d+hA'i skye bo

'i tshogs kyis sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul ba thos so/ /de nas sbrul gdug pa des rang gi lus la dmad de kha 'tshos nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas/ sum bcu rtsa

gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /

de nas sbrul gdug pa las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam

du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i

lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul do thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs gyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ /lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprika la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi

mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me

tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas

'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras

bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho skams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i

sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis

kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin du mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /

bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa

bgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar bka' ba yis/ /thub pa khyed ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'chang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud

cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa

dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i thad du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams

cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po longs nyal te ci bya/ de nas rgyal po sad de/ 'od chen po de dang lha'i bu de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu ste khyod su zhig ces dris so/ /

de na re bdag ni skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul gdug pa btul te shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar

gyur to/ /da bdag gis khyod la bstan gyis khyod song la bskyed mos tshal de'i phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas gter chen po phyung la bdag gi phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te yon gyi rabs kyang gdon

par gsol cig /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha'i bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangs so/ /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus rgyal pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /

de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul ma ga d+hA'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi rnams la bsgo nas skyed mos tshal der song ste gter phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum
gyi bar du bshos gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/ des sbrul gdug par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des

lha'i nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des shas cher chags pa bskyed de/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed

pa des ni sbrul gdug par skyes so/ /nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lha'i nang du skyes so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi

blangs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de bas na ser sna spangs ba'i phyir brtson par byas te/ ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid lha'i bur gyur pa'i

yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan la
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do// //zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha

rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang /

gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha

dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /

de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhing pa zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu

chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na/ sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mig sim par byed pa zhig btsas so/ /de yang bram ze des dka' bas rnyed pa yin te/ de la bu

dang bu mo gzhan yang med nas de bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas de 'jig rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i ming zla ba zhes btags so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong

khyer thams cad du brgyud de bskor nas/ bram ze de yang khye'u de la lhag par byams par gyur te/ 'chag pa dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dag gi tshe yang rtag tu legs par bsrung ba lhur byed cing 'dug go/ /bram ze de'i

khyim yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang nye ba zhig na 'dug go/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang bsten nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos

nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed do/ /de yang tshe thung ste shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis/
sems rnams pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das las

sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par

bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub dkor dag cing 'gul do thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can

lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spri ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams

cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor to/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam

pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i

ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi

ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas

kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang mnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lagaso/ /
yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis

de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis

mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal

nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las

rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed

pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum

mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi

bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ bram ze'i bu bu gcig pa de tshe thung ste shi nas/ de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i

lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i skabs su bram ze des bu gcig pa sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing

yid du 'ong ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa dang mi mthun pa med pa de dur khrod du khyer nas pang par bzhag ste kyi hud bu/ kyi hud bu thu bo/ kyi hud bu gcig zhes zer zhing 'bod de/ de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar 'tshogs kyang

bslang ma nus nas de khwa dang chun lag dang bya rgod dang wa rnams kyis ni bskor/ /bud med skra gshig pa dag dang ni 'grogs skye bo mang pos ni blta zhing 'dug go/ /de nas de'i bu lhar skyes pas pha smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas

snying rjes snying bskyod de/ pha'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lugs su sprul nas/ dur khrod kyi 'dab tu dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug go/ /de nas bram ze des drang srong de la dris pa/ kye'i drang srong chen po khyod dka'

thub 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ drang srong gis smras pa/ nga ni rgyal srid sgrub ste/ nga'i gser gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo byas la/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni

mdun nas 'dren te/ shing rta de la yang zhon zhing sa chen po 'di bskor bar 'dod do/ /bram zes smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar/ /rgyun tu dka' thub spyad byas te/ /dka' thub mchog ni spyad byas kyang / /gnas

de khyod kyis re mi 'thob/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ khyod kyang shi ba'i khog pa mi gtsang ba'i ro shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ bram zes smras pa/ sdug pa'i bu gcig pa shi ste de sgrub bo/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ gal

te lo brgya tham pa'i bar/ /rgyun tu ngu ba'i las byas kyang / /bu de khyod kyis re mi thob/ /khyod ni ngus kyang ci la phan/ /de nas bram ze de drang srong gi tshig bden no snyam nas dad pa skyes so/ /dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces dris so/ /

de nas drang srong gis cha lugs de mi snang bar byas nas/ rang gi cha lugs su 'dug ste/ pha la smras pa/ bdag ni khyod kyi bu gcig pa de yin te bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum

pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so/ /yab khyod tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bzhud cig dang / khyed kyang 'khor ba las 'da' bar gyur yang srid do/ /de nas bram ze des shi ba'i

rus bu bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden

pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bram ze des 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /des mtho bar 'gyur ba'i rnyed

pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas te song ngo / /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan

'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar pha'i mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong ba la yang bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas pha yongs su bskyabs pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che

ba ci yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i dus na so so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe yang pha gsad pa la thug pa la lan gsum skyabs byas te/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i

dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi byed pa zhig yod de/ de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi rnams shin tu grang ba zhig go/ /de nas re shig na de'i phas rkun po byas nas/ rgyal pos gshed

ma rnams la sod cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas bus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la gsol nas srog phangs pa byin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa

gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di yin no/ /byi ba byed pa'i bu de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis na des pha dang bu gnyis ka bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la de gnyis ka dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na de'i phyir de ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bas na

'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang chos thams cad bdag med pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par byas te/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces

bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //sa la

zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang

lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang

lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ /na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge

'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sa la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der srog

chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas shing sa la'i me tog blangs te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sa la'i me tog blangs te/ mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang bcom ldan

'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar gshegs nas/ bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes

bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis gyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun

nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sa la'i me tog gis gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo

snyam pa dang / re shig na de sa la'i shing la 'dzegs pa las lhung ste shi nas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes so/ /de nas re shig na lus dang gzhal med

khang sa la'i me tog gis brgyan te/ lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du song ngo / /de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing 'dug

pa las/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo lus dang gzhal med khang sa la'i me tog gis brgyan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ci phyir khyod kyi

lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad ma ud pal lta bur gyur/ /'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od byung 'di dag ci las gyur/ /ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/ /

las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/ /lha mos smras pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi/ /mi yi nyi ma nyan thos bcas/ /sa la'i me tog rdul med pa/ /bzang po dag gis legs

par gtor/ /las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni lhag par mngon tu mdzes/ /bzhin mdog pad ma zla ba ltar/ /rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing / /nyes pa thams

cad rnam spangs pa/ /mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir/ /de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ /bzhin mdzes pad ma'i mdab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ /bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi/ /sangs

rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/ /gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar
'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur

par des mthong ngo / /de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i

phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul do thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma

la'i lo ma dang spri ka la sogs pas byugs pa de/ lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo sa la'i me tog gi gzhal med khang de nyid de dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo / /

de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud

nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/

des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar

pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis

sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams

rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /

'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /

de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa

dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du/ 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /

dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/

bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no/ /bu mo gang gis lam khar me tog gis gtor ba de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong

lags so/ /de ni nga la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song

ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o bla mar bya'o ri mor bya'o mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes

dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs

pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon

rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas

mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal

zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong

khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams

med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying

pos bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/

shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang rma bya dang ne tso dang ri skegs dang khu byug dang shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod dang / skyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mo dam pa dang btsun mo 'khor dang bcas

te dong nas/ der btsun mo'i 'khor kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag ni gdugs gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ma'i rngo mi thog na/ lha btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i

dbu skra dang se mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal sro bar ci gnang / 'on kyang bdag cag gis de la rgyun du mar me dang bdug pa dang me tog dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis bkur
sti bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ /de nas re shig na rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbu skra dang se mo stsal du gsol 'on tang bdag gis mchis brang 'khor du

de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ zhal sro bar bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ /de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas

pas/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal sros nas/ de la btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mar me dang bdug pa dang me tog dang

spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis sbad de/ yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal

po byed pa bsad nas rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad de/ su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur sti ma byed cig ces khrims kyang bcas

so/ /de nas gang gi tshe tshes bcwa lnga la skabs 'byed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de la su yang phyag dar byed pa 'am mar me dang bdug pa dang me tog dbul ba med do/ /de nas btsun mo

'khor gyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa yang mthong rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang dran nas/ snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing kyi hud chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams

las 'gribs so zhes zer ro/ /de'i nang nas btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsdos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag dar byas te/ mar me'i phreng ba

dngar to/ /de nas re shig na rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du byung ste/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang / re shig na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan mas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar

me'i phreng ba dngar ba lags so zhes byas so/ /de nas dpal ldan ma bkug ste ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ces smras na/ de na re bdag gis khyod kyis bka' bcag tu lags kyang bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po

gzugs can snying po'i bka' ma bcag go zhes zer ro/ /de nas de khros nas 'khor lo 'phangs te bsad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /de'i

tshe lha mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa dang ldan pa de lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du song ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba

chen po de dang lha'i 'od dpag tshad gcig pa mthong nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad ma ud pal lta bur gyur/ /'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung
'di dag ci las gyur/ /ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/ /las rnams gang gis 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/ /lha mos smras pa/

'jig rten gsum mgon 'gro ba'i sgron gcig po/ /mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug pa'i sangs rgyas mthong / /smra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sel ba la/ /mun pa sel ba'i mar me yon tu phul/ /zla ba'i 'od zer mdog

dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /mthong nas thub la snying nas dad pa skyes/ /'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis/ /ston pa smra ba'i mchog la phyag kyang bgyis/ /las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni lhag par mngon tu

mdzes/ /zhing mdog pad ma zla ba ltar/ /rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyis zhing / /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir/ /de la khyod kyis

sa bon btab/ /bzhin mdzes pad ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ /bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/ /

gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las
gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo / /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal
ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /

de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad
'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam pa

dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po

nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod do/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho skams pa dang

rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma gyis rgyal pos kyang

ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma dgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por

ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyis mthus yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin

tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar

dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i

bu mo dpal ldan ma/ tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid

kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed gyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas rang gi srog dang

bsdos te/ sangs rgyas kyi mon tan rjes su dran nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba dngar nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas bsad de/ de nga la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste sum

bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ deng mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/ /

bla mar bya'o/ /ri mo bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ /mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gos shes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams

dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang

lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi

tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul de/

mthar gyis gser srang bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul ba de'i tshe de'i blo skyes pa ma la bdag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod kyis/ bdag gis skye bo dbul po

rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dad pa bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis skye bo mang po

la yang phan gdags par gyur la/ bsod nams mang po yang bskyed par 'gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsams pa de/ rgyal po la gsol nas/ rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa

thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor kyi mi khyed rnams nyon cig / deng nas zhag bdun na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi

phyir glang po che la zhon te/ dad pa sdud par 'dod kyis khyed gang gis ji tsam yongs su gtang bar bya ba de yongs su gtang bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas re shig na zhag bdun lon pa dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin glang

po che la zhon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dad pa sdud pa la zhugs te/ der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed de/ kha cig ni mgul gyi se mo do sbyin par byed/ kha cig

ni gdu bu sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dpung rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser gyi phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni sor gdub kyi rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser sbyin

par byed/ kha cig ni dngul sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni tha na zho'i brgyad cha tsam yang sbyin par byed do/ /khyim bdag de yang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir len par byed do/ /de nas re shig na bud med shin tu

dbul mo zhig gis sha thang ste/ zla ba gsum gyis ras yug cig rnyed nas des ras de gyon te srang du zhugs pa dang / des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dung 'bud cing rnga zlum brdung bzhin du rgyang nas 'ong pa mthong nas des dge bsnyen zhig

la dris pa ji ste/ khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste/ gter sa'i 'og tu sbas pa rnams kyang mthong na/ ci'i phyir 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing skor bar byed ces byas pa dang / dge bsnyen de na re gzhan la phan

gdags pa'i phyir te gang dag bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bshos gsol mi nus pa de dag gi don du phan 'dogs par byed de/ ci nas mang po bsdongs te bcom ldan 'das la dbul du 'jug go zhes zer ro/ /de nas

bu mo de'i blo skyes pa/ 'o na bdag ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin la/ bdag gcig pus bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba'i/ mthu bdag la med kyis/ bdag gis 'di la cung zad dbul bar bya
gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras yug gcig ma gtogs pa gzhan ci yang ma mthong ste/ /des bsams pa gal te bdag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag

gcer bur byung gis bdag khang thog tu song la ras dor ro snyam mo/ /de nas de khang thog tu song nas rang gi lus las ras phud de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi steng du bor ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/ 'dis khang

thog nas bor ba las na/ 'di la nor de las med gor ma chag snyam nas rang gi g.yog rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed dong la ras 'di sus bor ba ltos shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis bltas pa dang re shig na bu mo de tsog tsog por

'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis dris pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan brjod pa/ bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste bdag gis gos rnyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dge slong

gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes zer ro/ /de nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bu mo de la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskon to/ /

de nas de tshe thung ste shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ skyes ma thag tu lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gzhan su la yang med pa de lta bu'i gos dag de la byung ngo / /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon

pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan

'das la ras phul bar des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul do thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos rgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i

cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal

bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ras

'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i

lha'i bu mos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag
la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/
dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan
mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i
pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /

thub pa khyod kyi deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /

de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan

'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen

po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom

ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed gyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin

gyi/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa sdud par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te ngas de la chos

bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti bya ba'o bkur sti med par mi bya'o zhes dge

slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //ne tso zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang /

nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis

mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du

yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang

lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste

gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /rgyal po de yang dag pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs te/ snying rje che ba bdag nyid che ba
chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/ /de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/
lha ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo / /ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo / /da ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod
do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan to/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am mi gzigs pa 'am mi rtogs pa 'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig
pa dang ldan pa gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum

la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang

dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la
gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa/ /stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa phyogs bcur

grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nang dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/

su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas

ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi

dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las
rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs
rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te

lhung bzad bsnams nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyis gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ne tso mi skad shes pa zhig gnas te/ des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / /de nas shin
